content: > join our fb group for community > challenges cals lives and more > crochet & stories with sandra 1 **the boho table runner** **skill level** experienced beginner **finished measurements** any size **yarn** 1 ice yarns pure cotton 100% cotton 50 gr 80 m i used 2 5 skeins you can choose to use any yarn of your choice just measure your piece as you go **hook & other materials** ● us size h-8 5mm ● scissors ● yarn needle ● measuring tape **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch **specialty stitch ** v_stitch = dc1 + ch2 + dc1 in same st **notes** pattern is worked in row beginning ch1 does not count as 1st st this is an any size pattern you can decide how wide and long you want the piece to be by adding chains an foundation chain and adding row of the repeat pattern you can add tassels of fringes if you like or leave it without every row starts and ends with two double crochets one one each stitch this pattern has two parts the main center part with the repeat pattern and two row added on each side 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
